page.title: 07Employment In Tresillian
page.content: Until recently local men in Tresillian would work in 1 of 3 places -at the County Council Yard or Tregothnan Estate or on a local farm. Now a lot of people in Tresillian work in Truro ,Tresillian has became a commuter village. There are a few small businessess in Tresillian a farm and garden shop,a small corner shop(which could soon close because the owner wants to retire),an antiques and piano shop ,a garage (which sells petrol and carries out repairs),a small business making electric fittings and a hair dressers. Some people who live on the main road do a bed and breakfast which helps supplement incomes. The Highway depot is the main employer although there are also some other places of work like the farms, old people's home and another garage.
